system.Text:
__When you assess a situation, make preparations, or attempt to gain leverage__, envision your action and roll. If you act...

  * With speed, mobility, or agility: Roll +edge
  * With resolve, command, or sociability: Roll +heart
  * With strength, endurance, aggression: Roll +iron
  * With deception, stealth, or trickery: Roll +shadow
  * With expertise, focus, or observation: Roll +wits

On a __hit__, you succeed. On a __strong hit__, take both. On a __weak hit__, choose one.

  * Take +2 momentum
  * Add +1 on your next move (not a progress move)

On a __miss__, you fail or your assumptions betray you. @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.78baa51694fe37c5]{Pay the Price}.
